message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.MM

This paper deals with improving the performance of IEEE 802.11 wireless LANs through a handoff scheme. The paper focuses on network performance and optimization, which falls under the category of Networked and Distributed Systems (cs.NI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of context-awareness and decision-making algorithms, which are related to Information Theory (cs.IT) and Cybersecurity (cs.CR). The proposed scheme involves coordination between mobile nodes and access points, which can be considered as a control system (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the impact of the proposed scheme on the quality of service (QoS) of multimedia traffic, which falls under the category of Multimedia (cs.MM).
